text:
What's up everyone? Today we're learning 
English with the hits Netflix series The crown!

We've selected this really interesting scene for 
you where Margaret Thatcher and the queen meet

for the first time just after Margaret Thatcher 
is elected as the first female Prime Minister.

You'll learn lots of vocabulary and pronunciation 
if you keep watching. But before we get into

it and in case you're new here, every 
week we help you to learn fast English,

without getting lost, without missing 
the jokes and without subtitles!

just like Farina who says that our channel 
is extraordinary and she loves adding it to

her to-do list every day! So if that 
sounds good to you, don't forget to hit

that subscribe button and the bell down below 
so that you don't miss any of our new lessons!

If you struggle to understand fast speaking 
natives and want to improve in this area,

then I highly recommend our Fluent with 
Friends course! In this 48-week course you'll

learn with the first two seasons of Friends. 
You'll receive PDF power lessons every week,

vocabulary memorization software, access to our 
fluency circle global community and so much more!

But the best part is you can try it right now for 
free with our three mini lessons! All you have to

do is click up here or down in the description 
box below to learn more and sign up now!

If you're enjoying this lesson then 
I highly recommend you check out

this lesson we made with one of the 
Queen's famous christmas speeches!

You can click up here or down in the 
description box below to watch that lesson next.
